original_text: “Surely no one can stand in the way of their being baptized with water. They have received the Holy Spirit just as we have.”
korean_text: 이에 베드로가 이르되 이 사람들이 우리와 같이 성령을 받았으니 누가 능히 물로 세례 베풂을 금하리요 하고

sentences.original_text: Surely no one can stand in the way
sentences.korean_translation: 분명히 아무도 그 길을 막을 수 없습니다

sentences.original_text: of their being baptized with water
They have received the Holy Spirit
